Hello stranger, how can I help you?
I need some awesome weapon to smash the unfaithful! Give me some beer. Nevermind.

This is an inn, not a weapon shop.
Ehh..

This will be 2gp.
What? 1gp at most for this rabbit's piss! Here you go.

Ha! But those rabbits drunk real beer! You're funny guy. Fine, for you - 1gp.
Here you are. Sorry I changed my mind.
